column4: Hey everyone!  I just installed a default version of Breezy.  Is there a way modify some sort of config file or something in order to make the OS NOT automatically load gnome but rather just boot to a prompt or should I have done a server install instead?
just make it start to runlevel 3 instaed of 5 (e.g. by boot parameters)
how do I do that? or, where can I read about runlevels and how to change them
complex question... 'google and read' is my suggestion
